definitions.definition: A thing relating or belonging to something else; an appurtenance.
To designate or set apart something for some purpose.
definitions.example: to assign a day for trial

definitions.definition: To appoint or select someone for some office.
definitions.example: to assign counsel for a prisoner

definitions.definition: To allot or give something as a task.
To attribute or sort something into categories.
To transfer property, a legal right, etc., from one person to another.
To give (a value) to a variable.
